Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lawndale/27th
ShortDescription: Northbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Central Park, 26th and Lawndale: due to, street blockage near Lawndale/27th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Central Park, 26th and Lawndale: due to, street blockage near Lawndale/27th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Trains bypassing Jackson
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running, but are still not stopping at Jackson due to an medical emergency.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running, but are still not stopping at Jackson due to an medical emergency.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
